sections.heading: Getting Started with Streamlit
sections.content: Streamlit is an open-source Python library that makes it easy to create and share beautiful, custom web apps for machine learning and data science. Install with pip install streamlit, then create your first app with st.write('Hello World').

sections.heading: REST API Authentication - Authentication
sections.content: Implement authentication using JWT tokens, API keys, or OAuth 2.0. Include Authorization header with Bearer token. Handle 401 Unauthorized and 403 Forbidden responses appropriately in client applications.
